Widget.name: CheckBox
Widget.Description: This widget allows you to add a checkbox on a form.

Option.name: Name
Option.Description: Defines the name of this checkbox.

Option.name: Value
Option.Description: Defines the value of this checkbox.

Option.name: Label
Option.Description: Defines the label of this checkbox.

Option.name: Enable Validation
Option.Description: Specifies whether to enable validation for this control.

Option.name: Validation message
Option.Description: Specifies the message that will be displayed when validation fails for this field.
